title: Pimsleur Spanish I, II, III, & Plus (Complete Course) [MP3,
description:
This is the complete collection of Pimsleur for Spanish.
Audio is 192kbps to aid in listening. Enjoy!

This pack includes the complete Pimsleur Spanish Collection, in 192kbps MP3 audio. The collection consists of Spanish Levels I through III as well as Spanish Plus (an advanced level above Level III), along with the extra reading tracks for Spanish Levels I through III. It also includes the Speak and Read Essential reading booklets for Spanish I, II, and III.

----

Learn Spanish: The easy way. The Pimsleur Method provides the most effective language-learning program ever developed. The Pimsleur Method gives you quick command of Spanish structure without tedious drills. Learning to speak Spanish can actually be enjoyable and rewarding.

Grammar and vocabulary taught together in everyday conversation,

Interactive audio-only instruction that teaches spoken language organically.

The flexibility to learn anytime, anywhere.

30-minute lessons designed to optimize the amount of language you can learn in one sitting.
